page.title: 13A Schoolboy's Day
page.content:
Saturday 8th.June 1985. I got up,got dressed & had my breakfast.I wore my jeans & a blue cardigan.I did some gardening & read a book about animals,then I had my dinner.I took the dog for a walk & got ready for the sponsored walk at school.We picked up Jamie & his friend in our car on the way.I walked round the course 3 times to raise money for our school fund.After the walk we all had a picnic on the school field.When I got home I watched television.After that I had a wash,cleaned my teeth & went to bed.
Mark Gummer aged 8 years.
